notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: geysers (hot springs that erupt with steam and water)
example of geyser:
Old Faithful in Yellowstone
eruption every 77 minutes
not biggest geyser but most famous
interesting point about geysers:
not evenly distributed
most found in only four places in world
400 of 700 in Yellowstone in North America

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
